import React from "react"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import Search from "./Search/Search.tsx"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { selectorCart } from "../Redux/slices/cardSlice"; export default function Header() { const { items, totalPrice } = useSelector(selectorCart); const totalCount = items.reduce( (acc: number, item: any) => item.count + acc, 0 ); const pathName = useLocation(); return (
